document_data.name: Muffin
document_data.location:
[[Tegal's Mark]], [[Dalelands]]
[[Targos]], [[Ten Towns]]
[[Mulmaster]], [[Moonsea]]{{Cite organized play/LC/A Fistful of Drachmas|9}}
[[Fermata]], [[Arborea]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''Muffins''' were a variety of baked goods found across the [[Realms]], sometimes eaten with a cup of [[tea]] or served for morningfeast with a side of fruit.
{{quote|''[[Nalia de'Arnise|Nalia]], my dear, you've been positively morose as of late. Probably from studying all those [[scroll]]s. You remind me of [[Golodon]]... prior to his addiction to [[poppy]]-seed muffins, of course.''|[[Jan Jansen]]}}
document_data.Description: Muffin were small handfoods and some were flavored with [[blueberries]], and even [[poppy]] seed. Occasionally, muffins were used to smuggle secret messages or items hidden within.{{Cite organized play/LC/Knight and the Living Dead|3}}
document_data.History: In the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]], [[Sheila (baker)|Sheila]]'s Incredible Edibles stall sold the best baked goods in all of [[Ylraphon]] in the Vast, including muffins.
